All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCustomerController
    Controller for adding customer, this would allow set and get methods, also manipulates the add customer form.
    Appointment
    This Class is the Appointment class where it will containing all methods regarding the setter and getters.
    AppointmentContoller
    Controller for the appointment, includes get and set methods, logic validation and manipulation of the add appointment form.
    appointmentDAO
    This class is a data access object that will allow connection between updating, including getter, setters, etc.
    AppointmentReports
    This class is a helper class that will contain methods and lists to help with the report form.
    calculatehelper
    This is a helper class that will be doing validations and checks.
    Contact
    This class is to contain all data like the contact table from the database, contains getters and setter methods, in
    contactDAO
    This is a Data Access Object class that will allow any modification regarding updates, retrival or delete of contacts on the database.
    Country
    This class is hold on the same attributes of the Country table from the databse.
    countryDAO
    This is a Data access layer between the user of the database or recruit you into one.
    Customer
    This class is store all information that the customer table from database.
    customerDAO
    This is a data access object class that will allow the user to modify or add on appointments.
    DBConnection
    This class is a Data Access Object that will validate the connection of the database.
    Division
    This Class is to in house all the characteristics of the Division from the database.
    divisionDAO
    This is a Data Access Object that works between the Division table and Division object.
    holderData
    This class is a helper class that helps hold all data that the user selected from the mainscreen, this will help with transitioning over data.
    LoginController
    Login Controller that will handle form data and also login validation to see if user is able to login.
    LoginHelper
    This class is to help record any logins that are sucessull.
    Main  
    MainScreenController
    Controller for the main screen, set and get information from the database.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    Controller for the modify appointment form, will set, get, and validation information for and on the form.
    ModifyCustomerController
    Controller for the Modify Customer form, will set and get information to update the form.
    ReportsController
    Logic controller for the report form, includes setting or getting information to update the fields on the form.
    timeHelper
    This class is a helper class that will calculate the choicebox for times possible for appointments.
    User
    This class is hold all attributes of the user, specifically the user who is able ot log in sucessfully.
    UserDAO
    This class is a data access object that is a layer between the database and the User object.
